ctu_text: The scheme has the objective of providing coaching to the un-successful Madhyamik ST students who could not succeed due to various reasons of inconveniences. Special coaching is being provided to the Madhyamik failed ST students for a period of 7 (seven) months through NGO run Coaching centres. Stipend @ Rs. 65/- per student per day is provided to the hostellers.
